name: Why NFTs Are Not Dead - The Future Of NFTs Powered By Brands And Developers
description:
Brands are bullish on NFTs, utilizing emerging blockchain technologies to revolutionize their digital strategies.
This evolution is marked by NFTs transitioning from digital novelties to vital parts of digital interaction.
This talk will highlight the potential of platforms & brands that enable seamless integration of NFTs into digital ecosystems, showing how NFTs are not dead, but rather remain a dynamic and integral aspect of the evolving digital landscape.
